Introduction
This topic contains information on addresses for other agencies and record facilities, including
Public Health Service (PHS)
National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
facility possessing records of certain members of the Philippine Army and Philippine Guerrillas
, and
Judge Advocate General (JAG) office
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E - Service Record Address Codes and Addresses for Military Records Centers and Other Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E
